Text:
psspss, I've already commented a few times on some of your uploads but apparently you missed it, so I'll post it here since I'll know you be stopping by to get this new original release of mine... you don't have to put tNesrc or whatever in the file name. I'm flattered you'd do that, but it's unnecessary. Mentioning the source in the description is plenty.

Also, be thankful.  If all you have to say is "ta", save it...  If all you have is criticism about file name, size, or when it was/wasn't released; save it. We don't care. A lot of times you act very ungrateful and it gets very annoying.

i know i dont have too but if theres multiple sources i could use I add it.. as some people like to know which one I used

I wont unless the name gets to long

did you read my other comments on your torrents
about the sci chan show? and AGH?

I can understand not wanting to hear the criticism,but bitching that pss doesn't thank you the way you want?some one really needs to slap the emo out of you.you can't expect everyone to shove your cock down their throat like chuck does dude
